summary.span: 沿著一組 ，在指定的 ，將具有 的屬性值建立成動畫。

span.span: Animates the value of a property that takes a along a set of over a specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要畫面格動畫的目標值會由其屬性，其中包含的集合物件。A key frame animation's target values are defined by its property, which contains a collection of objects. 每個定義區段的與它自己的目標動畫和。Each defines a segment of the animation with its own target and . 動畫執行時，執行時從一個索引鍵值到下一個在指定索引鍵的時間。When the animation runs, it progresses from one key value to the next at the specified key times.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A不接受文字做為子系，因此這個方法會引發`InvalididOperationException`除非在衍生的類別已覆寫允許加入文字的這項行為。A does not accept text as a child, so this method will raise an `InvalididOperationException` unless a derived class has overridden this behavior which allows text to be added.

exception.span: 不接受文字做為子系，因此除非衍生的類別已覆寫允許加入文字的這項行為，否則該方法會引發這個例外狀況。

span.span: A does not accept text as a child, so this method will raise this exception unless a derived class has overridden this behavior which allows text to be added.

param.span: 建議的目的值，如果沒有明確設定動畫本身的結束值，便會使用這個值。

summary.span: 計算值，這個值表示正在建立動畫之屬性的目前值 (由 執行個體所決定)。

span.span: Calculates a value that represents the current value of the property being animated, as determined by this instance of .

returns.span: 屬性的計算值，由目前的執行個體所決定。

span.span: The calculated value of the property, as determined by the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`defaultOriginValue`是第一個組合鏈結中，這個值會是快照集 （如果有的話） 或基底屬性的值，否則這個值會以鏈結中前一個動畫所傳回的值不是 。If the `defaultOriginValue` is the first in the composition chain, this value will be the snapshot value (if one is available) or the base property value; otherwise this value will be the value returned by the previous animation in the chain with an that is not . `defaultDestinationValue`是基底值，如果動畫會在動畫的屬性上的第一個組合圖層中; 否則值是從上一個組合層次屬性的動畫的輸出值。The `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value if the animation is in the first composition layer of animations on a property; otherwise the value is the output value from the previous composition layer of animations for the property.
